channel.title: Can someone help me?
channel.description: Ok well umm im tryna download the latest moparscape and then it says i need to be admin thats no problem, i asked for help and someone mentioned that once it load that i press f8 and go into safe mode then make myself an admin, so i tried that and there were no accounts there that i could log onto, btw i use profesional not home. Most of the time i just do run as and type in the admin password and ur prolly asking, why not log into the admin? because there ISNT an administrator account which is kinda messed up, so does any1 know how i can fix this?

item.title: Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:8, topic:24343”]Yes, j4m3s, which is James? is right, windows won’t let you delete the administrator account. Once you make another account though it disappears from the user login screen. To log onto it you have to go onto safe mode.

To go onto safe mode follow these steps:

  1. Restart the computer, or start it if it’s not on.
  2. Press f8 or f10 depending on what type of computer you have.
  3. Pick safe mode.[/quote]
    He said he already tried that and it didnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Yes, j4m3s, which is James? is right, windows won’t let you delete the administrator account. Once you make another account though it disappears from the user login screen. To log onto it you have to go onto safe mode.

To go onto safe mode follow these steps:

  1. Restart the computer, or start it if it’s not on.
  2. Press f8 or f10 depending on what type of computer you have.
  3. Pick safe mode.

Read full topic
